i be causin a roaring ruckus with ye!
arr she be a fine ship
me ship be full of treasure for ye!
i be the captain of me ship!
it be these fish! yar har har!
ARR! be lookin' at this mess we've made!
i shoulda left that statue where i found it!
that blimey volcano sprung out of nowhere!
and now it be wanting to EAT!
there be only ONE way to fix this mess
to the top of the volcano!
to the mouth of the volcano!
if it be fruit BIG BIG KAHUNA wants...
ARR! HERE WE ARE BIG BIG KAHUNA!
eat THIS ye giant tiki decoration!
follow me to the green side!
follow me to the red side!
follow me to the yellow side!
DONT ye be fallin' in maties!
this be a fine snack for a pirate!

legend says there be TREASURES within
but only those that find the Sacred Fruit can enter...
nay i not be going in
as much as i be lovin' treasure...
i best be fixing this mess
follow me to the Green Tribe!
arr I can smell the watermelon from here
who be hungry for some watermelon?
this totem be making a nice face
Green Tribe! Make a face like this totem here
help ye self to some pizza up here
be careful with the seeds mateys
ye dont want to be swallowing them
a watermelon might grow in ye belly!
follow me to the Red Tribe!
swimmin in a sea of sweetness!
help ye self to some smoothies
who be wanting a Rockhopper Special?
get em while they be fresh!
follow me to the Yellow Tribe!
it be like an apple but with pine!
Arr those chairs look a peeling
don’t be lookin so sour at me mateys
ye be makin me some new slippers!
we be makin the Rockhopper Special
AHH that be a grand smoothie
CAN YE GUESS WHAT HAPPENED NEXT???
WHO BE TELLIN THIS TALE? YE OR ME?
YE WONT BELIEVE WHAT HAPPENED NEXT
THAT BE THE END OF ME TALE!
YARR HARR! YOU BE A FINE BUNCH O LISTENERS!!
LYING IN THE MIDDLE OF A DESERT!
I THOUGHT I WAS DONE FOR!
TOOK SEVERAL STEPS TO THE LEFT
AND BRUSHED SAND FROM ME BEARD
THE CHAINS WERE ACTUALLY ME OWN ARMS
I WAS TRAPPED IN ME OWN DOOM HUG!
AND ESCAPED THE VOLCANO JUST IN TIME!
FACING DOWN A FLEET OF ENEMY PIRATES!
SO I CALLS OVER TO THEM...
AND THEY CALLS BACK TO ME...
SO I CALLS BACK TO THEM...
OFF WITH YE! YE LILY-LIVERED PRIVATEERS!
AND THEY CALLS BACK TO ME...
YAR HAR! I BE WINNING THIS ROUND OF PIRATE-TALK!
AND THE LOT OF THEM RETREATED!
ARR! PIRATE-TALK BE SERIOUS BUSINESS, SAYS I!
SO I TRIED TO BLOW UP A BALLOON
AYE, BUT I COULDNT DO IT
THERE BE ANOTHER WAY TO FILL EM!
CAN YE GUESS WHAT I USED MATEYS?
TRYING TO ESCAPE WITH ME CHEST OF TREASURE!
THERE WERE SHRIMP TO THE LEFT
THERE WERE SHRIMP TO THE RIGHT
I STEPPED OVER THEM AND ESCAPED
UP TO ME BEAK IN SWAMP WATER!
I THOUGHT I WAS DONE FER
SO I STOOD UP AND WALKED OUT
ME CREAM SODA BARRELS HAD EXPLODED!
I CAUGHT SOME IN ME HAT
AND IT LASTED ME UNTIL I GOT BACK HERE!
it be good to see ye!
Yarr and I be shipshape today!
ARRR! how be ye this fine day?
HAR HAR! i be just fine mateys!
good to see ye pirate lads and lasses!
me beard keeps me warm on me travels
Yarr be keeping lookout at me ship
i went to me island for some thinkin!
Arr! course I can be ye friend!
I be acceptin all pirate friend requests
me favorite animal be a puffle!
I like pirate music that I can dance a jig to!
me favorite sport be a snowball fight
me hobbies be sailing and treasure findin
find me key to open me quarters
aye me key be hidden on this island!
have ye found the key to me quarters?
what ye all think of me Captain's Quarters?
i be plannin adventures and countin treasure
i be takin care of pirate business
i be storin treasure on Rockhopper Island
it be where I store all me treasure!
ARR who be wanting to play a game?
be there anyone whos seen Yarr?
i bet he be playing hide and seek
has anyone got a box of puffle os?
arr! be there anyone who knows how to make pizza?
No he not be over here
thanks me crew! we found our first mate
thank ye for helping find Yarr!
Arr ye be too good at this game
what be a pirates favorite letter?
but it be the C they love!
why don't pirates eat peanut butter?
because they can't open the jaarrrr!
i be plannin adventures and countin treasure
i be storin treasure on Rockhopper Island
i be takin care of pirate business
can ye help find me treasure?
there be treasure here I feel it in me flippers!
a slice of ye best pizza please
ARR I be making yer pizza!
ye be wanting squid and stinky cheese aye?
i be savin some for later
sing a sea shanty with me!
a sailor went to sea sea sea
to see what he could see see see
but all that he could see see see
was the bottom of the deep blue sea sea sea
me hearties! thanks for the fun!
this be time for me to go!
i need to plan me next adventure!
Let's get this show on the road
You can't stop us, Super Villains!
Back to the Club Penguin Times!
Go out in the street and get the news
I could really use your help with this story
I need a report in the Town right away
Oh yes, you seem like a wonderful reporter
Come back as soon as you get the story!
I need a good photo of the villain!
Someone check the papers coming off the press
Are the stories all in line?
Who, What, Where, Why, When, hoW
I need reporters out in the field
Someone run to the Boiler Room
This is definitely a coffee day...
Super Villains have robbed the Bank
Super Villains have escaped the Jail
Super Heroes are rescuing citizens downtown
Robbery at the Bank! Let's move!
The news waits for no one!
No Villain can stop the presses!
The voice of the people will not be silenced
You Super Villains don't stand a chance
The pen is mightier than the sword...
Pick on someone your own size!
Aim for the Destructobot's weak spot
Why not join me for a cup of tea?
What can I do to help?
I'd like to ask you some questions
What made you want to become a Villain?
What sort of super powers do you have?
Are you planning on taking over the city?
Do you have a secret weakness?
Don't worry, this is off the record...
Have you considered becoming a Super Hero?
I think you'd be a better Super Hero
Back on your feet Super Heroes!
You only fail if you give up
You Super Villains are the worst!
You'll never get away with this!
Turn away from the dark side!
May I ask you some questions?
I've got some questions for you!
Citizens want to know the truth!
I've got some questions for you
I have some questions for the newspaper
What made you become a Hero?
Where did you get your powers?
Did you make your costume yourself?
Do you have a secret fortress?
Have you defeated any Super Villains?
What made you want to become a Villain?
What sort of super powers do you have?
Are you planning on taking over the city?
Do you have a secret weakness?
Don't worry, this is off the record...
Have you considered becoming a Super Hero?
I think you'd be a better Super Hero
Have you been on Rockhopper's ship?
Have you sent me a question?
Have you sent me a joke?
I receive so many each week
It is so tough to choose
My favorite animal is a puffle
My hobbies are writing and reporting
Would you like to interview me?
I like all the costumes very much
I would be pleased to give an interview
Oh, I would love to be your friend
Please add me as a friend
Do you have my background yet?
Do you read the Club Penguin Times?
Do you mind if I interview you?
I have too many favorites to say for sure
My favorite games are Find Four and Mancala

is there a party going on here?

any requests for DJ K Dance?

penguins on the RIGHT say ICE!
penguins on the RIGHT say HEY
penguins on the RIGHT BARF FACE
penguins on the LEFT say WIN
penguins on the LEFT say COLD
penguins on the LEFT say OHHH
when I say DONT DANCE u say NO CHANCE!

wave em like ya just don't care
let me mix some beats for ya!
spin the record, find the groove
dance the dance watch me move!
dance it up lets see ya moves
break it down lets see ya groove!

k! everyone to the Gift Shop!

catch ya on the flip side!
We face a most dire enemy
The Dragon King Scorn has conquered the land
Only a band of heroes can defeat him
Who shall quest with me to the Mountain of Misery?
Who shall step forward to face Scorn?
I am the great wizard Gary
I can see into the future!
I am sworn to defeat Scorn!
We shall stop his evil reign!
We must travel up the mountain...
It has been an honor to quest with thee
There are matters I must attend to
I must travel alone for a time
I would be honored to call thee friend
I would have a pizza with thee!
I enjoy insects, for though they are small...
I enjoy a rousing game of chess
Oh, I'm afraid I don't play many sports
What is your favorite sporting event?
I enjoy lute music very much
A lute is like a little guitar
Let us embark on our quest!
Let us journey to defeat Scorn!
We now face the Dragon King!
It is where I study the ancient magics
If Scorn tries to get in...
...he will get a pie to the face!
...he will be turned into a frog!
...there are a lot of stairs here
I'm afraid I know not of what you speak...
And a wizard knows many things
Perhaps you are thinking of a different wizard?
I know not of this Herbert you speak...
...Is he in league with the Dragon King?
Let us discuss it another time
Scorn seeks to conquer our town
We must go on a quest
To collect the three magical items
To journey to the Mountain of Misery
To defeat Scorn once and for all!
Will you save Club Penguin from the Dragon King?
We must gather a band of heroes
And unto the Mountain of Misery!
It is said that those who possess the Skyward Staff...
...can open the path to the Sky Kingdom here
I am not sure though, for I do not have the staff
The Skyward Staff can only be claimed...
Only those worthy may use the Skyward Staff!
And home of the Forest Folk
We have been shrunk by fairy magic
Do not worry, we shall change back
This is the magical Fairy Branch
It has been enchanted with powerful magic
It will serve you well as your slingshot
For it cannot be destroyed by Scorn!
Let us ask the Forest Folk for their wisdom!
We shall leave thee in peace
...will we find the three magic items?
...should we travel to the Mushroom Kingdom next?
...will the dragons of Dragon Peak help us?
...can we use the Bridge of Destiny to reach Scorn?
...if a tree falls in the woods...
...Are we going to stay so small?
Does anyone else have any questions?
Together we shall free the kingdom!
This is where I study magic
Scorn has placed this statue here...
These are the Spheres of Starlight...
They are filled with pure starlight
If you burst them near Scorn...
Take as many as you need
We must carry them to the top of Mount Misery
Do you wish to visit my home?
I have many interesting things to share
Hmm, I think I shall mix some potions...
Let me gather some magical spells
I wonder what this potion tastes like...
I wonder what this tastes like...
Can you pass me a new potion?
Can you help me mix this?
These poor penguins have been turned to stone...
If we defeat Scorn, they shall be free!
You must gather some of these Cursed Stones
They have been cursed by Scorn himself
We must use his magic against him!
I suppose we should clean up the place
I'll just use some magic later to fix it
Magic is a lot easier than muscle
It just takes a few centuries to master it
The village is free from Scorn!
The penguins have turned back to normal!
Home of the Onyx Dragon Clan
Do not fear, they are good dragons...
...though they tend to play a little rough
We must pass through this gate...
Would anyone care for some spiked volleyball?
That ball is rather sharp, isn't it?
This is the Bridge of Destiny!
This is your last chance to turn back...
...if you do not think you can face Scorn
Take one of these Battle Capes!
It shall serve you well in your battle
Sort of a rickety bridge, yes?
I guess they don't make them like they used to...
It's a good thing I have a flying spell...
The fate of the island rests on you!
Your cruel reign ends this day!
You have defeated the Dragon King!
You have freed Club Penguin from Scorn!
I am very proud of you all
Hmm be careful of that statue
Who knows what evil powers it could have
Our journey has come to an end
Peace is returning to Club Penguin
Climb to the top of the Sky Tower
Use your staff in the tower...
You have all proven yourselves true heroes
True magic lies in the hearts of the brave
This is where I conduct all my experiments
We are safe from Scorn in here
He cannot get by my magic!
Try looking through my telescope-us maximus!
Would you care for some tea?
It's a game normally for wizards...
...so you should get the hang of it
I will describe something in the room...
Ahh, that's a tricky one, isn't it?
Hmph! I see that one was too easy...
I spy with my wizard eye something...
...that helps you read in the dark!
I shall count up the scores...
I am rather excellent at this game!
Well done! You must be very wise!
Feel free to try those magic potions...
Just make sure not to spill any
I wouldn't suggest drinking them though
You might turn into a frog
You might turn into a dragon
You might turn into a pony
You might turn into a toaster

Jet Pack Guy giving me a high five!
hey! that looks like my hat!
help! im stuck in this jelly!
i need hungry penguins here pronto!

ill race you up the stairs!
ill give you a head start

how did you get over there?
we will figure out this tricky maze!

its like the bridge of a song!

ill need to order a smaller igloo

...its making me hungry for more puffle os!
do I know you from the wilds?

make sure not to run around the pool...

it looks hard but it just takes practice

can you do a trick for me?
have u taught your pet any tricks?

ill describe a kind of puffle...

we found it on the Wilderness Expedition

its favorite toy is a disco ball

where do u want to go?
would ya like to hear a story?
Ive got loads of stories about puffles!
so I had just become interested in puffles
and I decided to try and become one of them!
I made my own purple puffle costume!
I looked just like a purple puffle
so I went into the wilderness
they are definitely an acquired taste
I realized that puffles are similar to penguins
and that I really love o berries!
after a week I went back to my igloo
would you like to hear another story?
I'll tell you how I discovered brown puffles!
when i came across a strange machine
it took me down to a secret beach
where i found a strange boat
it took me to a small undiscovered island
i had discovered a new puffle species!
I keep puffle treats in my jacket
all my gear is custom made
it keeps me warm in the wilderness
ive got all the pockets i need now
theres lots of puffles in the wild
I want to adopt em all!
have u ever been to the wilds?
id like to see a puffle like that!
what do ya think of my look?
my favorite games is Puffle Roundup!
I also like Puffle Rescue too.
my favorite food is puffle os and o berries!
my favorite animal is a puffle!
I enjoy live music and checking out new bands
I like sketching, hiking, and training puffles
alright mates ive got to go
im headed back to the wilds
the wilderness is calling for me!
